articles.title: China Evergrande’s founder under investigation, shares halted - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: World’s most indebted property developer did not say what were the ‘illegal crimes’ for which he was being investigated.
articles.content: China Evergrande Groups founder is being investigated over suspected illegal crimes, the embattled developer said on Thursday, as creditors become increasingly concerned about the groups prospects am… [+5199 chars]

articles.description: Prime Day 2? Kinda - Amazon Prime Big Deal Days is coming in October, with deals just for Prime members. Here's everything you need to know.
